items.name: Eyeshadow
items.description: An eyeshadow palette of seven rich, buttery shades in a range of long-lasting finishes, each inspired by our iconic Soft Pinch Liquid Blush collection.

items.name: Eye Patches
items.description: Cooling under eye patches that hydrate, smooth, and revive skin for a refreshed look in minutes. The perfect prep step before makeup!

items.name: Eye Primer
items.description: A weightless, hydrating eye primer that smooths lids while prepping you for longer-lasting, amped-up color that won’t crease, fade, or smudge all day.

items.name: Lip Liner
items.description: A super creamy, waterproof lip liner that glides on like a balm to define and shape lips with rich, stay-put color. Available in the same 10 made-to-match shades as Kind Words Matte Lipstick.

items.name: Lip Stick
items.description: A super creamy, waterproof lip stick that glides on like a balm to define and shape lips with rich, stay-put color. Available in the same 10 made-to-match shades as Kind Words Matte Lipstick.

items.name: Lip Gloss
items.description: A super creamy, waterproof lip gloss that glides on like a balm to define and shape lips with rich, stay-put color. Available in the same 10 made-to-match shades as Kind Words Matte Lipstick.

items.name: Lip Pack
items.description: Limited Edition: A full-size lip duo featuring Soft Pinch Tinted Lip Oil and Kind Words Matte Lip Liner in the perfect universal rose brown.

items.name: Lip Stain
items.description: A full-size lip stain featuring Soft Pinch Tinted Lip Oil.

items.name: Lip Oil
items.description: An innovative lip jelly that transforms into a lightweight oil, starting off glossy, then leaving lips tinted while staying comfortable—never sticky—all day.
